title: Replay Video Exits League "League Update Has Begun"
body:
When I click on a replay (i downloaded it 4 days ago), it exits League and reopens League on the sign in page, but it has the "League Update Has Begun" page on it. 

Are my replays outdated or is this a bug? The game im trying to open and watch was from 8/2.

replies.body: You should be able to download that file to be honest! Have you tried running a [Hextech Repair ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367)on your client yet? It may be a file that has been corrupted, but with that Hextech Repair it should repair the file and allow you to download the replay. If not, make sure to let me know and we'll take a closer look into the situation.
